bioprojects.title: WGS of bacteria isolated from seafood products

assembly_info.submitter: The French Research Institute for Exploitation of the Sea
assembly_info.assembly_method: Genome ssembly using CELIA Workflow (https://github.com/ifremer-bioinformatics/celia) version 1.0.0 ; Completeness assessment using BUSCO version 5.1.3_cv1 ; Quality control using FastQC version 0.11.9 ; Visualization of assemblies using Bandage version 0.8.1 ; Multi-sample summary reports using MultiQC version 1.10.1 ; Sequence alignment using BLAST version 2.11.0 ; Genome alignment using Bowtie2 version 2.4.4 ; Average nucleotide identity (ANI) using FastANI version 1.32 ; Read depth calcul
